channel.title: Dumplings on This is Wei
channel.description: Recent content in Dumplings on This is Wei

item.title: Soup Dumplings
item.description: There are so many good soup dumpling (Xiaolongbao/小籠包) places in the world. The most well known one must be Din Tai Fung (鼎泰豐). Since Din Tai Fung has not yet entered the New York market, I have tried many other great soup dumplings in the area. And yes, I did have Din Tai Fung. Din Tai Fung Shanghai Asian Manor Nanxiang Hot Kitchen 456 Shanghai Restaurant Full House Cafe Soup Dumpling plus
